page.title: 08Transport in Wembley (cont)
page.content:
{ {RAILWAY(cont.) For both local services,to and from { {central London,}and for the long distance ones electric trains are used.
ROADS : The{North Circular Road } This is one of the main roads around { {central London }and carries very heavy volumes of traffic. By using this it is possible to avoid having to drive into the centre. Near us the North Circular crosses the A40 Road,which goes via Oxford to Fishguard in Wales.There is now a big under-pass there called the"Hanger Lane Giratory System".
